header

Class ESATemplateChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • header.ESA
      • header.ESATemplateChannel

  • public class ESATemplateChannel
extends ESA
    ESATemplateChannel is responsible of reading and writing signal template channel information from and to a file

      • Fields inherited from class header.ESA
